title: Pygmy Necklace
summaries: The Pygmy Necklace is a pre-Hardmode / post-Plantera accessory that provides the player with one additional minion slot. It is purchased from the Witch Doctor for 20 at night.

On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the player must have defeated Plantera and have the Pygmy Staff in their inventory in order for the Witch Doctor to sell the item.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases your max number of minions by 1
statistics.Buy: 20
statistics.Sell: 4
